remarks: Distributive law for scalar product (right-distributivity). ( ~ ax-hvdistr1 analog.)  (Contributed by NM, 10-Jan-2014.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 22-Sep-2015.)
statement:
lmodvsdir.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
lmodvsdir.a $e |- .+ = ( +g ` W ) $.
lmodvsdir.f $e |- F = ( Scalar ` W ) $.
lmodvsdir.s $e |- .x. = ( .s ` W ) $.
lmodvsdir.k $e |- K = ( Base ` F ) $.
lmodvsdir.p $e |- .+^ = ( +g ` F ) $.
lmodvsdir $p |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ ( Q e. K /\ R e. K /\ X e. V ) ) -> ( ( Q .+^ R ) .x. X ) = ( ( Q .x. X ) .+ ( R .x. X ) ) ) $.
